metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16396 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Ruby before 2.3.8, 2.4.x before 2.4.5, 2.5.x before 2.5.2, and 2.6.x before 2.6.0-preview3. It does not taint strings that result from unpacking tainted strings with some formats.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16396` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.3 - 2.3.1-2~16.04.11
ruby2.3 - 2.3.1-2~16.04.11
ruby2.3-tcltk - 2.3.1-2~16.04.11
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ruby2.3 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.1-2~16.04.11').
